name: Root Beer Pulled Pork Sandwiches
description: Slow-cooked pulled pork braised in root beer and finished with barbecue sauce, served on kaiser rolls.
ingredients: 1 boneless pork shoulder butt roast (3 to 4 pounds)
1 can (12 ounces) root beer or cola
instructions: Place roast in a 4- or 5-qt. slow cooker. Add root beer
cook, covered, on low until meat is tender, 8-10 hours.
Shred pork with two forks; return to slow cooker.
Cook, covered, until heated through, about 30 minutes.
